results.title: Through the years
results.creator_credit: Marita Kent, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Despite being diagnosed with Turner’s Syndrome, Marita Kent was determined to live a normal life. Looking back over the years, Kent has much to be proud and happy about.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Marita Kent, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Let me explain...
results.creator_credit: Samantha Van Zanen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Samantha Van Zanen’s story starts with a dramatic childbirth but mostly reflects on the darkest years of her life as she coped with having Turner’s Syndrome. The bullying, needles and anguish were alleviated somewhat by her family and close friends.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Samantha Van Zanen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Dr Phil's story
results.creator_credit: Phil Bergman, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Dr Phil Bergman is a pediatrician and endocrinologist. He was encouraged to become involved with the Victorian Turner’s Syndrome Association and has since become a specialist in the field. Over the years he has contributed greatly to the care of those with Turner’s Syndrome and values support for those with the condition as much as medical advancements in the area.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Phil Bergman, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Diary of a backpack
results.creator_credit: Gabrielle Guaran, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Gabrielle Guaran’s backpack tells of all the adventures taken with her owner, a woman with Turner’s Syndrome. Depsite getting old, Guaran hasn’t given up on her backpack, in much the same way she refuses to give up on the life she wants to lead.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Gabrielle Guaran, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Beautiful brown eyes
results.creator_credit: David Facey, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When David Facey’s daughter was born the first thing he fell in love with was her beautiful brown eyes. Ironically, it was those same eyes that told him something wasn’t quite right.

results.title: 3,000 Years of Conflict
results.creator_credit: Ian Austin, Dennis Porter and East Coast Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Hidden India Series”.
Breathtaking in scope,”3,000 Years of Conflict” traces India’s turbulent history from the Aryan invaders in 1500 BC to Independence in 1947.

results.title: 700 Million Faces
results.creator_credit: Ian Austin, Dennis Porter and East Coast Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Hidden India Series”.
India is a land of contradictions. Mrs. Ghandi discusses in an in-depth yet light-hearted and often amusing interview, India’s contemporary and greatly diversified lifestyles.

results.title: Stories in stone
results.creator_credit: Ian Austin, Dennis Porter and East Coast Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Hidden India Series”.
Mark Twain described India as, “the one land that all men desire to see and having seen once, even a glimpse, would not give that glimpse for all the shows of the rest of the globe combined”. This video explores many of the familiar and not so familiar monuments of hidden India. They range from massive carvings to mind-boggling man made temples.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Ian Austin, Dennis Porter and East Coast Productions

results.title: Hidden India
results.creator_credit: Ian Austin, Dennis Porter and East Coast Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Hidden India Series”.
India is a complex country of multiple languages, lifestyles, religions and cultures which are thousands of years old, a country of hidden wonders which the average tourist never sees. This documentary explores many of these wonders and vividly recounts, even dramatically reconstructs some of India’s intriguing stories.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Ian Austin, Dennis Porter and East Coast Productions
